oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Miss Acuff and Niss Nichols
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two women are sitting against a fence. A two story farmhouse, other farm buildings and a large two story building are in the distance on a hill.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bald Hill (Wheat, Tenn.); Farms; Farmhouses; Fences; Housing; Schools; Wheat (Tenn.); Wheat School (Tenn.)
Acuff, Miss; Jones, George; Nichols, Miss
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On front of image, Miss Acuff & Miss Nichols 1877 Bald Hill; Wheat School [with arrow pointing to building in distance]; "George Jones" written under farmhouse on right. ORO-86-88 stamped on back of photograph.
